pr_title: Rename CUSTOM_PME_PARAMETERS to ALIGNMENT_PARAMETERS, add endpoint fo…

timeline.author: jbartece
jbartece

timeline.bodyText: Document the expected values in the Map, please.
timeline.author: jbartece

timeline.bodyText:
We store the generic parameters as a single String in the DB and also will provide it as one String in the UI.
I think is should be just a Map<String, String>.
timeline.author: jbartece

timeline.bodyText: "set in resource config file" - it is implementation detail, which shouldn't be on the REST API. The important information is, that these strings are the default params.
timeline.author: jbartece

timeline.message: Rename CUSTOM_PME_PARAMETERS to ALIGNMENT_PARAMETERS, add endpoint for retrieving default alignment parameters for build types

timeline.bodyText: I think it should be: according to a build type chosen by a user
timeline.author: jbartece
